review.reviewBody: Absolutely the best burgers and fries/ GF poutine, ever. I love Blaze.  Often when I have friends over, I'll order us all burgers right away from here, because *everyone* loves them.  👏 ❤️
Consistent quality. Have not found a better halal burger. Not greasy. Real cheese and housemade sauce.
first tine trying Blaze burger took advantage of the 2 for 1 deal. we were super impressed. high quality, big portions. Our new favorite goto burger place!!!!!
usually I don't review but they actually make it good so I thought I'd shout out. the burger was put together well all the Ingredients where fresh would order again

Falafel Blaze Burger (V) & fries were so good!!😋Instructions followed, well packed. Definately
recommend this place👍😋
